_xResult.title: Most of Coats Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen coat with dress length option
_xResult.longdesc:
The days of being one ‘thing’ are over. Versatility is the key to surviving in this modern century. Why not have your clothes reflect this sentiment?

 

This custom made linen jacket is the perfect addition to your wardrobe. The upsides to this texturized garment are endless: artisan-grade work, sculpture like texture, warmth from head-to-toe, plus custom everything: color, length and measurements.

 

If you've never experienced having a coat or jacket made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
